price: (Noa) kaa sε: ”Menkorͻfoͻ meyε kͻkͻbͻni pefee ma mo-
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
